newsitem.title: USA: 3M sees $500 mln in display component sales.
newsitem.headline: 3M sees $500 mln in display component sales.

text.p: Minnesota Mining & Manufacturing Co said Wednesday it expected its sales of electronic display components to reach about $500 million by the year 2000.

"We expect electronic display to reach a $1 billion annual sales opportunity by the year 2000," said Paul Guehler, the division vice president, at the company's biannual investors' meeting. "We expect to achieve at least one half of this market or several hundred million dollars," he said.
Although Guehler declined to specify the company's current sales of electronic display components, he said 3M had made "substantial progress" toward that goal.
Guehler said of the $1 billion in projected sales, optical films would comprise $300 million, projection-screen components $250 million, coatings $250 million and computer filters $200 million.
